original_text: That person will say clearly to everyone, “I did things that were not right. I did wrong things, but God did not punish me as I deserved. That person will say clearly to everyone, “I did things that were not right. I did wrong things, but God did not punish me as I deserved. That person will say clearly to everyone,
korean_text: 그가 사람 앞에서 노래하여 이르기를 내가 범죄하여 옳은 것을 그르쳤으나 내게 무익하였구나

sentences.original_text: That person will say clearly to everyone,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 모두에게 분명히 말할 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: I did things that were not right.
but God did not punish me as I deserved.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 내가 마땅히 받아야 할 대로 벌하지 않으셨습니다.
